sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { SendemailContexte } from '../contexte/SendemailContext'; import { useContext } from 'react'; import sendEmail from '../sendEmail'; import phoneImg from '../images/contacts/phone.png' const Form = () => { const {donnees, setDonnees} = useContext(SendemailContexte); const handleChange = (e) => { // create the new state and set it setDonnees(prev => ({ ...prev, [e.target.name]: e.target.value })) e.preventDefault() } const onsubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() sendEmail(donnees.objet, donnees.firstname, donnees.lastname, donnees.email, donnees.city, donnees.message); setDonnees({ firstname: "", lastname: "", email: "", objet: "", message: "", city: "", }) // console.log(donnees) } const contacts = [ { id: 1, image: phoneImg, titre: 'Phone', valeur: '+212631585540', }, { id: 2, image: phoneImg, titre: 'Email', valeur: 'Younes@gnail.com', }, { id: 1, image: phoneImg, titre: 'Adresse', valeur: '67 Mouisset Agadir', } ] return (

Please fill out this field.

Contact INFO

{contacts.map((contact) => { const {id, image, titre, valeur} = contact; return (

{titre}

{valeur}

) })}
) } export default Form
